agents
Class AbstractSwarm

java.lang.Object
  agents.AbstractAgent
      agents.LoneAgent
          agents.AbstractSwarm
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAgent, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SwarmArrayList, SwarmHashMap
public abstract class AbstractSwarm
extends LoneAgent

An AbstractSwarm is composed of several Agents, each one with its own ISelector.

See Also:
